short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find and switch between browser tabs across multiple browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FindYourTab: Streamline Your Browser Navigation
Drowning in browser tabs? FindYourTab helps you navigate your digital workspace with precision and ease.

Key Features:
- Instant tab search and switching within your current browser
- Companion Python app enables cross-browser tab management
- Minimal, intuitive interface designed for efficiency
- Local-first approach with strict privacy protection

How It Works:
FindYourTab provides a quick, global hotkey (Ctrl+Alt+F) to access your open tabs. The optional Python companion app extends functionality across Chrome, Brave, Opera, and Firefox.

Privacy-First Design:
No cloud syncing, no data collection. Just a lightweight tool that keeps your browsing organized and your information secure.

Simplify your digital workflow. Download FindYourTab and take control of your browser tabs.
